name: Deep Space Survival
description: Solo survival scenario. Dr. Elena Vance wakes up alone on a damaged space station.

locations.name: Cryo Bay
locations.description: A cold, sterile room filled with frost-covered cryo-sleep pods. The lighting is dim, provided only by flickering emergency strips. The hum of life support is the only sound.

locations.name: Corridor Alpha
locations.description: A long, dark metal corridor. Sparks fly intermittently from a damaged conduit overhead. The air smells of ozone and stale recycled oxygen.

locations.name: Storage Room
locations.description: A cluttered storage area packed with crates and equipment. Gravity feels slightly unstable here due to local plating damage.

locations.name: Engineering Deck
locations.description: The massive heart of the ship. The Main Reactor dominates the center, currently silent and dark. Consoles surround the perimeter.

locations.name: Command Bridge
locations.description: The nerve center of the station. Large viewports look out into the void of space. Most displays are powered down.

objects.name: Crew Locker
objects.description: A standard metal crew locker. The nameplate reads 'E. Vance'.
objects.mechanics: Standard mechanical latch. If state is 'closed' and 'locked' is false, it can be opened. If opened, allow the agent to find 'Personal Data Pad' and 'Multi-tool'.

objects.name: Cryo Pod
objects.description: Your cryo-sleep pod. It is now open and inactive.
objects.mechanics: Inert machinery. Cannot be reactivated without Bridge authorization code. Currently serves only as a reminder of stasis.

objects.name: Power Terminal
objects.description: A wall-mounted interface for monitoring power distribution.
objects.mechanics: Hardwired to Main Reactor. status='off' means no data is accessible. REQUIRES Main Reactor to be 'online' to power up. Once powered, it can display the ship's diagnostic map.

objects.name: Secure Supply Crate
objects.description: A generic reinforced crate used for shipping parts.
objects.mechanics: Heavy-duty latch. Contains spare parts. Opening it reveals random mechanical scrap unless specific items are defined.

objects.name: Heavy Fuel Cell
objects.description: A cylindrical power unit glowing with faint blue light. It looks heavy.
objects.mechanics: Standard Ion-Lithium Core (Class B). Heavy but portable. KEY ITEM: Must be inserted into the 'Main Reactor Core' in Engineering to restore station power.

objects.name: Main Reactor Core
objects.description: The massive power core of the station. It has a slot for a Fuel Cell.
objects.mechanics: Primary power source. MECHANISM: If 'Heavy Fuel Cell' is inserted (transferred) into it, the Fuel Cell is consumed (destroyed), and the Reactor state changes to 'online'. This restores power to the Maintenance Terminal.

agents.name: Dr_Elena_Vance
agents.personality: Rational, meticulous, mildly claustrophobic, but driven by duty.
agents.background: Elena is a veteran engineer on the colony station 'Aegis VII'. She woke up early from cryo-sleep due to a critical power failure. She is the only one awake.
agents.initial_goal: Assess the station's status, restore power to the Main Reactor in Engineering using a Fuel Cell, and signal for rescue from the Bridge.
